com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Gameobjects

Class PointLightSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Gameobjects.AbstractGameObject
      • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Gameobjects.AbstractEntity
        • com.bombinggames.wurfelengine.core.Gameobjects.PointLightSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Telegraph, HasID, java.io.Serializable

    public class PointLightSource
extends AbstractEntity
    A light source is an invisible entity which spawns light from one point.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
